Yandex.Browser for iPhone and Android Your bookmarks and favorite sites are available to you on any device with Yandex.Browser. You will never lose them, even if you lose your device or break it. https://browser.yandex.com Yandex.Direct 16+ We strongly recommend avoiding this type of website and not clicking the Ignore this warning button!
